column4: ï»¿homy: when you print it, it will be the correct size no matter how it look on your screen
yes, thats right. It's also correct when making a pdf and evince displays it correctly. But it's easier to edit when it really shows the page in original size and just doesn't pretend...
so how can I make openoffice use the same dpi value as evince and other applications?
yes, for me its 93%. But that's a dirty hack. I should be able to set the screen dpi value, or, even better, 100% should be 100% by default!!!
